subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts sustained a devastating blow when defensive end Dwight Freeney was placed on season-ending injured reserve Wednesday with a Lisfranc fracture and dislocation to his left foot.
snippet: The Indianapolis Colts sustained a devastating blow when defensive end Dwight Freeney was placed on season-ending injured reserve Wednesday with a Lisfranc fracture and dislocation to his left foot.
